data.text:
üîãIn a strong move towards fostering sustainability and environmental responsibility, the European Union has enacted the EU Batteries Regulation 2023/1542. This regulation replaces the EU‚Äôs previous regulation on batteries sold in the market and partly focuses on their environmental impact. Moreover, it comprises mandatory carbon footprint verification requirements and other stringent regulations, signifying a new era for businesses in battery production, import, and sales within the EU. Evert Vermaut, Team Lead & Consultancy Manager at Vin√ßotte, tells us about the challenges and urgency of this regulation. Read more ‚û°Ô∏è https://lnkd.in/epFrGj5u #BatteryRegulation #EU #Battery #Legislation #Kiwa #Vin√ßotte

This year, we partner up with the Innoptus Solar Team, providing our safety expertise for their upcoming participation in the Sosal Solar Challenge in South-Africa later this year. Read more in our new blog article! https://lnkd.in/eEU34m5Q

We are proud to present our new digital learning platform, specially designed to meet all legal requirements for radioprotection training. Complying with legal training requirements can be a complex, costly, and tedious process. But don't worry, Vin√ßotte Controlatom is here to help! As a recognized institution in the field of radioprotection, we strive to simplify and ensure compliance with all training courses. We currently offer over 19 different online learning modules, ranging from basic training to continuous professional development. And new modules are constantly being added! Over 3,000 people have already completed our online courses. We look forward to welcoming you to our online learning environment soon. Let's work together to create and maintain safe work environments. Visit our website and discover our wide range of training offerings https://lnkd.in/evW55BMf #radioprotection #elearning #training #legalrequirements #safety

Looking for a challenging job for a company in full digital transformation? Do you want to be part of a team that is always looking to do the best for our customers? Then you should join us.
